definition: to recover one's sight/(fig.) to recover (lost territories)
the sun and moon shine once more/fig. things get back to normal after an upheaval

sentences.english: The teacher arranges to write an article concerning weekend, but Shigemitsu cannot write it up.
sentences.chinese: 老師佈置寫一篇有關週末的文章，重光葵寫不出。

definition: surname Qi/also used in place names
Qingyang county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui
Dijun, Shang dynasty protector God, possibly same as legendary Emperor 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
the intersection of the Moon's orbit with the ecliptic in Vedic astronomy (Sanskrit rahu)
Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
the Dragon King of the Eastern Sea (mythology)
